thread.title: Petrobras receives $117 million in financing to acquire UK goods and services

title: Petrobras receives $117 million in financing to acquire UK goods and services
text:
April 13, 2018 / 11:58 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago Petrobras receives $117 million in financing to acquire UK goods and services Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - Brazilian state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA ( PETR4.SA ) has received a financing line of 400 million reais ($117 million) from Credit Agricole Corporate Investment Bank ( CAGR.PA ) to be used to acquire goods and services from UK suppliers, the company said. 
In a statement on Friday, Petrobras, as the company is known, said the financing line expires in 2029 and comes with a guarantee from UK Export Finance, the United Kingdomâ€™s export credit agency. 
($1 = 3.41 reais)
